flawed_nl_solution:
In an hour, she needs to earn $10 * 100 cents / $1 = <<10*100=1000>>1000 cents.
In an hour, she must pick 1000 cents / 5 cents = <<1000/5=200>>200 weeds.
There are 1hr * (60 minutes / 1 hr) = <<1*60=60>>60 minutes in an hour.
There are 60 minutes * (60 seconds / 1 minute) = <<60*(60/1)=36000>>36000 seconds in an hour.
She has 36000 seconds / 200 = <<36000/200=180>>180 seconds to pick each weed.
#### 180

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600, not 36000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
